title: Sunrise route capture
missionText: Start a route 30 minutes before sunrise and capture three golden-hour photos.

title: Local legend log
missionText: Ask a resident about a legendary spot and add the location note in your journal.

title: Main street scout

title: Market day pulse

title: Bridge view perspective
